text: Dirk van den Broek (; 27 March 1924 - 8 April 2020) was a Dutch businessman. He was the founder of the Samenwerkende Dirk van den Broek Bedrijven. A couple of years later he changed his stores, just into Dirk named after himself. He was founder of travel agent D-reizen. He was born in Amsterdam. Van den Broek died at the age of 96 on 8 April 2020.Supermarket founder Dirk van den Broek dies age 96 ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch businesspeople Category:People from Amsterdam
title: Dirk van den Broek
